name: Banished To The Bayou
description:
You are Laura, a big city girl who's just had it with the big city. You take a Greyhound, hitchhike the final stretch of your journey to nowhere in particular, and wash up at the gas station rest stop in Galloway, a small town in the Bayou. 

Here, you meet folks who embrace life way out yonder - and they look the part. As you tell them your story, one of them offers you a job, and a place to stay - and you are kinda strapped for options. What better way to meet new people than to work in the one place EVERYONE has to go to? 

As you serve your customers, chat with your guests, and hang out with your friends, you slowly begin to unravel the mysteries of Galloway and its inhabitants. 

You dared to leave everything behind for a new life - but do you dare to stay?
